context: 'oo' is an Estonian interjection used to express various emotions and psychological states. It can convey amazement, surprise, admiration, delight, shock, disappointment, regret, sadness, anger, annoyance, or contempt. The word also serves to emphasize statements, appeals, desires, or rhetorical expressions with heightened emotional or poetic tone. Its meaning depends heavily on the context in which it is used.
